description: Based on a story by Helen Levchuk, this animated short children's film is the story of Doris Dingle and her three cat - Donna, Dayoh and Deedee - and their adventure one windy and rainy day. A funny and visually delightful for children aged three to ten and their parents. Illustrated by John Bianchi. (Awards: Chicago; San Francisco; New York) Also available on DVD [319319].
